long_description: The Komperdell Thermo mittens are worn over a pair of gloves to protect your hands in frigid winter weather, and when you need more dexterity, just flip the mitten tops back to expose your fingers. Mittens are designed to be worn over a pair of lightweight five-finger gloves. Windproof neoprene fabric adds excellent warmth, protecting your hands in frigid winter weather. Flip the mitten tops back to free up your fingers for operating zippers and handling a cell phone. Closeout.
